articles.content: Scientists have decoded how the COVID-19 virus interacts with proteins in human cells during infection. The study will help improve the understanding of the immune response triggered in the host body… [+2127 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: Singapore panel recommends maximum level of COVID-19 vaccine coverage - Reuters
articles.description: An expert committee convened by Singapore's health ministry has recommended all residents medically eligible for COVID-19 vaccination to take shots as they become available, although it said vaccination should remain a voluntary option.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
FILE PHOTO: The first shipment of coronavirus disease (COVID-19) vaccine arrives in Singapore December 21, 2020. Betty Chua/Ministry of Communications and Informations via REUTERS/F… [+2110 chars]
